      This sets the encoding scheme to be used in setting and getting string data from the byte array.
      ByteArray ByteArray.setOrder(ByteOrder order)
      This sets the byte order to be used in setting and getting binary, numeric data (short, int, long, float, double) from the byte array.
      ByteArray ByteArray.slice(int displacement, int length)
      Creates a new ByteArray backed by the same buffer, but with a different slice or view of the data based on the specified displacement and length into this ByteArray.

      Converts String object to byte array.
